Thanks. I like Nero express to burn my data dvd's.
Just hit burn data dvd, add my stuff and burn. No bullshitting.

I've been a happy user of old Nero 7 Ultimate for years, no problems there.

I tried to install Nero 7 to my friend's computer, running Windows 7, no go. Not compatible.

So I Torrented this Nero 9. Install went fine; the Torrent, crack and program all work well.

However!

Nero 9 has a a painfully long install, sloppy and confusing layout, and doesn't come with an Image Mounter for ISOs and BINs.

Bad Nero! Go to your room!

100% NOT WORKING!!!
